# Fix Permissions

## Overview

Fix Permissions is a Saltbox module that resets ownership and permissions to the configured user's on key locations.

---
<!-- END SALTBOX MANAGED OVERVIEW SECTION -->

## Deployment

```shell
sb install fix-permissions
```
